collection: This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

Information We Collect
    
    We collect the following types of information from our users:
    
    Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, and payment information, which you provide when using our services.

Purpose of Data Collection
    
    Your data is collected for specific purposes:
    
    Order Processing: To manage your purchases and provide the services you request.
We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children.

Consent
    
    By using Founder Chat, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this privacy policy.
sharing: However, to improve the AI personas and make them more relevant, we may share a summary of the questions asked by users with our experts.
